sentences.en: A variety of dilute mineral acids are used to extract the anions.
sentences.cn: 用各种稀的无机酸来萃取阴离子.

sentences.en: Cyclization occurs readily with dilute alkali.
Dilute the paint with water until it is the consistency of milk.
sentences.cn: 用水把涂料稀释到牛奶般的稠度。

sentences.en: If you give your baby juice, dilute it well with cooled, boiled water.
sentences.cn: 如果给婴儿喝果汁，要用凉开水充分稀释。

sentences.en: Phenols and anilides can be nitrated with very dilute nitric acid.
sentences.cn: 酚类和酰基苯胺能被极稀的硝酸硝化.

sentences.en: Residual amounts of iron and aluminum dilute the phosphate content.
sentences.cn: 残采的铁铝降低了磷矿的含量.

sentences.en: That's important because breeding could dilute the qualities that make a pig medically useful.
sentences.cn: 这极为重要,因为育种能冲淡猪的特性,这使猪能在医学上更有用.

sentences.en: The doctor told him to bathe his eyes with a very dilute solution of boric acid.
sentences.cn: 医生叮嘱他用稀释的硼酸溶液洗他的眼睛.

sentences.en: The poisons seeping from Hanford's contaminated land quickly dilute in the water.
sentences.cn: 从汉福德受污染的土地里渗出的有毒物质很快就在水中稀释了。

sentences.en: The water will dilute the wine.
There was a clear intention to dilute black voting power.
sentences.cn: 明显有意图要削弱黑人的选举力量。

sentences.en: These worms are placed in dilute salt solutions.
sentences.cn: 将蚯蚓放在稀释盐溶液中.

sentences.en: We will dilute the ingredients for the children's version.
sentences.cn: 我们要减少成份含量,使之适于儿童服用.

sentences.en: Zinc displaces the hydrogen of dilute acids.

words.tran_cn: 稀释，冲淡；稀释法；冲淡物
稀释（dilute的过去分词）；使减低（效果）

trans.tran_en: a dilute liquid has been made weaker by the addition of water or another liquid
to make a liquid weaker by adding water or another liquid
to make a liquid weaker by adding water or another liquid
